name: ng2-translator
description: A simple translation service and directive that manages multiple languages

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run document

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:security
scripts.test:unit: mocha --check-leaks --compilers ts:ts-node/register --require core-js/es6 --require mocha-chai-helper --require reflect-metadata --require zone.js --globals window src/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:integration: mocha --compilers ts:ts-node/register --require core-js/es6 --require mocha-chai-helper --require reflect-metadata --require zone.js --require zone.js/dist/async-test.js src/*.int.ts
scripts.commit-documentation: git add doc/ && git commit doc/ -n -m "docs: update documentation" || echo "No changes committed"
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
